titles.title: Condemning hard-labor prison camps in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as an egregious violation of human rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/31/2009--Introduced. Condemns hard-labor prison camps in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as a violation of human rights. Demands that the government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea release U.S. reporters Laura Ling and Euna Lee.
